LanguageData.VME_Death_DontCare.label: don't care
LanguageData.VME_Death_DontCare.description:
Death is inevitable, should we lose an ally or slay an enemy it is not to be thought about.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Colonists won't get any mood effects for losing other colonists.
LanguageData.VME_Death_Normal.label: normal
LanguageData.VME_Death_Normal.description: Death is inevitable, an incredibly sad fact of life.
LanguageData.VME_Death_Troubling.label: troubling
LanguageData.VME_Death_Troubling.description: Death is inevitable, but we prefer not to dwell on it and not be reminded of its reality as much as possible.
